page.title: 09*****:The Village Hall******
page.content:
The village hall is a memorial for the first and second world war.It had to be rebuilt in 1977 because it was fgalling down, because the army used to have their meals there in the second war. It has a big room, a kitchen, two toilet, a bar, and fire exits and a side annex. The floor is slippery and is covered with wooden tiles. Discos, Bingo, exhibitions, youth club, shows, Women's Institute and Old time dancing are held there. We do P.E. there and school shows. The county council rents it for school. The hall is owned by the Village Hall Committee.
Written by Mathieu Cunliffe aged 9yrs.
